comment: super easy. take it! easy A, work is easy. you can complete one month's amount of work in 3 hours.

take him take him take him! so understanding and loves educating students about wellness. he also understands that not everyone has the same physical capabilities and doesn't penalize you on it. just make sure to remember due dates from the online textbook assignments.
so easy
Soooooo awesome !!!!! Take take take

Great Professor! Coming to class will give you points and will tell you what on the powerpoint to write down as they will be a test question. Only a midterm and final and modules that are online which is part of the access code you have to buy so you are in the class. He is very passionate about what he teaches and wants everyone to benefit.
Easiest class ever. We dont even do actual physical activity, just online work. Highly recommend.

This class was super easy. All you need is the online textbook and you're set. The deadlines are set by the textbook so he has no control over those, but overall the class is literally just completing the textbook. Both the midterm and final are online, so this is a super easy A.
rating_tags: Tests? Not many--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Mr. Martinez is awesome! He really cares about you taking from this class more than just a grade. Clear grading criteria with possibility of extra credit. He is super approachable. He asks that you be responsible and show up to class. No need to ask for permission to be out. Show up to class and take notes and you will pass with an easy A.

Mr. Martinez is the best professor to take for Wellness. He is chill and he realizes that not everyone is "fit." The activities we did were not hard. He also doesn't try to make being fit seem easy. He often discusses and makes jokes about the challenges he faces to stay fit. Come to class. He does surprise participation group projects sometimes.

Super easy class, that takes little to no effort. Do your modules and show up when there is an activity in class and you'll get an easy A! David is super personable and always happy to help if there are any issues! Take him!
Great Professor! Super easy class. Do the modules and show up when there is an activity and you will pass.
Dave is awesome! Super easy class that doesn't require much effort. Do your modules and attend class when there is an activity and you'll get an A without a doubt!

Just go to the class on the days with projects, he gives you an outline of the dates and tells you which days have activities. Other than that just do the easy modules on the website and you'll be good. Easy A

He is a wonderful professor. Do all the assignments, take the online test, show up for class activities... and you will pass. There are 2 group assignments... you can choose the group. You don't need a book much, but you will need the labs in the book. Very easy!
Great class, very easy and he does not waste your time with unnecessary work.
Definitely take him for HPS. He is a beyond easy grader as long as you do the assignments.
Martinez is the best teacher at KSU! He gets that his class isn't the only one you're taking and leaves you to get whatever grade you want. It takes more effort to fail than to get an A.

great professor! I'm surprised the average grade is a C. Always show up to class, there is no reason no to, there are days specifically where we don't have class to do our work. So easy! Take notes in class-they will help you on your test! In class quizzes that are simple-just off your notes! There is no reason to receive less than an A.

This class is probably the easiest class I've ever taken at college. Show up, take a couple notes, do a couple of (incredibly easy) "labs," and take the ONLINE tests. This happened to be a joint class too, so there were a bunch of people with another professor. They both graded leniently and offered extra credit too. This class was a godsend.

Very easy class. Most of the stuff was common knowledge. The other stuff wasnt too tough. There were some interesting points, but mostly boring in my opinion. All the tests were online, so overall it is an easy A. My class had two classes merged into one so it could get a bit confusing at times. Overall easy prof to get the class out of the way

Easy A. Online exams- questions/answers come from slide shows/lectures. Class never was longer than 45 min. Activities are simple; need textbook to do them. He's also very approachable if you already know you're going to miss an in-class activity just tell him and he'll work it out with you.
Loved Martinez. Tests are easy if you look over the material and listen in class. The activities are fun, just find a good group.

He is very funny and entertaining. He knows his material. This class is an easy A if you read over notes and take notes. NOT all notes are uploaded online. Class is not mandatory unless there is a lab assigned that day. This class with him is super easy!
Funny guy, easy course.  The course is not involved much physically but has supplemental information.  Stay for the reviews

OK so if you show up to class and take the notes you will have all the material you need.  DO STAY for the reviews!  They give you all the answers needed, study that and your guaranteed an A!  He is very engaging and funny not to mention super hot!  Made class go by a little faster :) do the labs and your golden.
co-taught, but great experience. worked well with other instructor. test reviews were extremely helpful so don't miss, and make sure to turn in work, and you will get an A.

Best gen-ed professor you'll ever have. He's extremely nice, funny, and easy to understand. He requires very little of you. EASY to get an A!! The only reason I went to class is because he's extremely attractive!

One of the best teachers at KSU. I actually looked forward to going to this class. Learned a lot of cool stuff. Go to class b/c sometimes he gives hints for tests. Do the study guides before tests and you will make an A.
He co taught but best teacher ever!!!!

Easy Class.. Do the Study Guide.. Stay for the Study Reviews [They give hint and questions] and you should be fine.. I never made an A on the test becuase I didn't study but still ended up with an A in the Class... Do the lab and extra credits you should be fine.. U will learn a lot in a fun experience
Easiest class ever. Do the study guides before the tests and fake the labs and you get an A.
Great professor. Keeps the class interesting. Very helpful

Really nice, fun, helpful guy. Easy class, powerpoints online, do the study guides before each test and it's impossible to fail. Lots of weekly 'labs' online, which are super easy & take five minutes, but they add up to a lot so don't forget about them! He helped me calculate what I needed to get on the final & to make up to get an A in the class.

Fun, interesting guy. Seemed to really enjoy his subject. However, gosh, this class was the biggest waste of time ever. If you can't make an A in this class, sorry about your life. All you have to do is turn in the tons of small assignments, which take 5 minutes and require no brain power at all.

He is a great professor and very helpful. He gives a review to every test and if you stay after he hands it out he will help you fill it out. Actually, he will probably give you exact questions and answers. However, go to class on review days because there will be a graded pop quiz! Everything is online and the work can be tricky so read the book.
Dave is great.  Very helpful and fun.  Take him, you will do well.

This class is very easy! You have labs and projects in this class, but he lets you turn things in as late work. He gives you a study guide that is basically the test. If you do the labs and projects you will get a good grade. He drops your lowest test grade. If you show up to class and do the study guide, you will get at least a B.

Very easy. Lots of labs that you need to do, but extremely easy. Be there for activity days. The review is just like the test and if you stay after they give you the review they will help go over some of the answers with you. Recommend!!!
great
